name: Chain React
description: Chain React is the premier US-based React Native conference, returning July 30â€“31, 2026. Organized by Infinite Red, it brings together leading experts, core contributors, and developers from companies like Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, and Expo for in-depth talks, workshops, panels, and networking focused on the latest advancements in React Native, cross-platform mobile development, performance, architecture, and community-driven innovation.
